titleStmt.title: A vvord to Dr. VVomocke. Or, A short reply to his pretended resolution of Mr. Croftons position concerning ministers use of an imposed liturgie. To which is annexed, a blow at Jerubbaal redivivus: discovering his weakness and errours in defence of his groundless secession from solemn publick worship ministred by the English liturgie. By R.S. the publisher of reformation not separation.
titleStmt.author: R. S.

titleStmt.title: A vvord to Dr. VVomocke. Or, A short reply to his pretended resolution of Mr. Croftons position concerning ministers use of an imposed liturgie. To which is annexed, a blow at Jerubbaal redivivus: discovering his weakness and errours in defence of his groundless secession from solemn publick worship ministred by the English liturgie. By R.S. the publisher of reformation not separation.
titleStmt.author: R. S.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Womock, Laurence. Aron-bimnucha, or, An antidote to cure the Calamites of their trembling for fear of the Ark.
Reproduction of the original in the Worcester College Library, Oxford.
